HediffDef.label: chemical dependency
HediffDef.description: This person has a genetically-induced biochemical dependency on a specific drug. Without regular consumption of the drug, their body cannot maintain itself in a healthy state and they will suffer degrading health and mood until they die.\n\nTakes effect after age: 13.
